name: Slime It Up!
description:

Result: 1st Place! 🎉🎊

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PavlakaKecapKupus.SlimeItUp

Welcome to the adorable and addicting world of Slime It Up! - the latest game on the Google Play Store that will keep you entertained for hours on end!

In this game, your mission is to stack as many cute and colorful slimes on top of each other as possible while carefully balancing the wooden plank beneath them. The more slimes you stack, the higher your score will be. But be careful, if you don't play fast enough, the game's challenging physics will test your skills and potentially cause an explosion with the slime bombs that could upset your balance.

With various types of slimes to stack the game will challenge you to think fast and make quick decisions. In addition, connecting three slimes or more will earn you additional points making the gameplay even more exciting and dynamic.

With its cute and colorful graphics, fun sound effects, and addictive gameplay, Slime It Up is the perfect game for all ages and skill levels. So, what are you waiting for? Download the game today and start stacking those slimes!
